## local-chart-version set

Modify a local chart's version number in place

### Synopsis


Modify a local chart's version number in place

```
local-chart-version set [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -c, --chart string        Path to a local chart's root directory
  -h, --help                help for set
  -m, --metadata string     
  -p, --prerelease string   
  -v, --version string      New version of the chart
```
